participant_1.background:
I like to take my boat out on the weekends and just relax, not really doing anything productive.
i just graduated college with my bachelor s degree in education.
i wish i could play the stock market well.
i am incredibly smart.
When I'm not taking care of my family, I like to go off-roading in my truck.

participant_2.background:
I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court.
i write short films.
i found out that i am carrying twins.
I took up brewing my own beer and became a regular at local car shows with my Ford F-150.
My family is full of witty people and we love cats.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing great! I'm pregnant with twins!
Thank you! I'm really excited. How are you?
I'm doing good. I just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education.
That's awesome! What are you planning to do with your degree?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about teaching or working in a school.
Those are both great options. I'm sure you'll do great!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go off-roading in my truck, take my boat out on the weekends, and play video games.
Those all sound like fun activities. I like to write short films, play basketball, and go to car shows.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try writing a short film.
It's a lot of fun. You should give it a try!
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
